entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
